item.title: Russian court sentences U.S. journalist Evan Gershkovich to 16 years in prison
item.description: A Russian court convicted Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich on charges of espionage Friday, sentencing him to 16 years in a Russian prison colony in a trial the U.S. denounced as a sham.

item.title: Drone strikes Tel Aviv, killing one. Houthis claim responsibility
item.description: The deadly drone slammed into an apartment building on the Tel Aviv oceanfront just after 3 a.m. The Houthi militia in Yemen said it carried out the attack as part of its support for Palestinians.

item.title: Days are getting slightly longer — and it's due to climate change
item.description: So much ice is melting at the Earth's poles that it's affecting the rotation of the planet, scientists say. Its spin is slowing down slightly, causing days to get longer.
